snippet.title: Ruins To Fortress - Social Media Short Trailer
snippet.description:
Discover our beautiful, upcoming free-to-play pixel art open survival game. 🎮 Stay notified by following and wishlisting us on Steam.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2585860/Ruins_To_Fortress/

Explore a post-apocalyptic island, craft, build, tear down enemy bases, defend and nuke your rivals! Life's about surviving in this multiplayer game, no matter what it takes! Check out our demo on Steam.
